content: to slip stich over and start with the second v stich slip stich into the top of the chain 3 and turn row 6 left chain 3 make your 7 v stiches double_crochet in the top of the last double_crochet from the previous row chain 10 skipping the corresponding 10 spaces single_crochet 8 slip stich around the chain 3 turn your work single_crochet 18 work your scales starting on the first v stich slip stich into chain 3 turn row 7 left chain 3 make your usual 7 v stiches we are adding 2 v stiches to this row so skip a space double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in the next space skip a space double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next space skip next space 1 double_crochet single_crochet 12 slip stich around chain 3 turn single_crochet 12 work your scales single_crochet into top of chain 3 row 8 through 10 you are simply going around making you 9 vs stiches and 12 single_crochet then working the scales as you have been row 11 single_crochet 40 around i like to make sure i m going through the tops of the scales to tack them down row 12 single_crochet 40 row 13 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 together x5 row 14-21 single_crochet 35 fasten_off and weave in end
